snippet.title: Dread Pilots - Official Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Dread Pilots on Steam https://klei.gg/dreadpilots From Klei Entertainment, creators of Don't Starve, Invisible Inc, and Griftlands comes Dread Pilots, a new space survival exploration sandbox game. You are a Dread Pilot, an unfortunate soul trapped in a dangerous and uncaring purgatory with only your wits to aid you in your quest to escape.

WELCOME TO THE DREAD
The Dread is a pocket dimension somewhere between deep space and a nightmare. You face mutated, carnivorous plant life, mind-bending anomalies, living computers, fanatical cults, space vampires and more as you traverse its many regions in a desperate search for resources and allies. Explore dark infected caverns, soar past glistening technological landscapes, and navigate chaotic mineral fields, all animated in Klei Entertainment's signature hand-drawn 2D style.

For more information visit https://klei.gg/dreadpilots

-------------------------------------------------

Klei Shop: https://shop.klei.com

#dreadpilots #pcgamingshow #klei
